alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Juniata; Northern Lycoming; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 09 at 7:24AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON EDT TODAY THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. Rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches expected with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...A portion of central Pennsylvania, including the following areas, Adams, Columbia, Cumberland, Dauphin, Franklin, Juniata, Lancaster, Lebanon, Montour, Northern Lycoming, Northumberland, Perry, Schuylkill, Snyder, Southern Lycoming, Sullivan, Tioga, Union and York. * WHEN...From Noon EDT today through this evening. * IMPACTS...Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Franklin; Juniata; Northern Lycoming; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan; Tioga
